mod.alwaysallowtp.name: Always Allow Teleport
mod.alwaysallowtp.description: Safe teleport system - Secure player-to-player teleportation in any mode
command.tps.no_cheat: §cOnly player-to-player teleportation is allowed in non-cheat mode
command.tps.usage:
§e=== Always Allow Teleport Commands ===
§6/tps <player>§f - Teleport to specified player
§6/tps <player1> <player2>§f - Teleport player1 to player2
§6/tps <player> home§f - Teleport player to spawn
§6/tpshome§f - Teleport to your spawn
§6/tpshere <player>§f - Bring player to you
§6/tpstome <player>§f - Same as above, bring player to you
§6/tps <player> <x> <y> <z>§f - Teleport to coordinates (cheat mode only)
config.alwaysallowtp.title: Always Allow Teleport Configuration
